name: Prairie
description: A vast prairie offers unlimited travel routes and abundant grazing land, but the lack of landmarks can cause travelers to become lost. The open terrain is perfect for mounted combat and hunting, while the seasonal fires can be both destructive and beneficial. Additionally, expansive grasslands with tall grasses create a sea of vegetation that can hide travelers and wildlife. the rich soil supports diverse plant life, while the seasonal changes create dramatic shifts in the landscape's appearance and accessibility.
atmosphere: Vast sea of grass stretching to the horizon with endless space and natural beauty. Fresh air scented of grass and earth. Tall grasses hide travelers, but lack of landmarks causes disorientation.
